title: Meditation - Crystal Infused Aromatherapy Spray - Healing Stones for You
description: Our Meditation - Crystal Infused Aromatherapy Spray can be used to help deepen your meditations. Shake to activate and spray.
cleaned_text: Meditation - Crystal Infused Aromatherapy Spray We created this Meditation Spray by combining the power of Crystals, with the benefits of Essential Oils and Aromatherapy. Our Meditation Aromatherapy Spray can be used to help deepen your meditations. To use, simply 'Shake to Activate' and then set your intention. As you spray, say something simple like: "I ask for help to deepen my mediation." This Crystal Infused Aromatherapy Spray is made of 100% Therapeutic Essential Oils, which are Certified Organic. This Spray is infused with 9 healing Crystals that were chosen to amplify the intention of the Spray. We chose Snowflake Obsidian, as the Crystal for this Spray, because it helps you surrender in meditation. This Meditation Aromatherapy Spray is custom blended, after each order is placed, which guarantees freshness. The Essential Oil blend that we offer in this Aromatherapy Spray was created based on TCM (Traditional Chinese Medicine) principles, and our knowledge of the healing properties of Crystals. This Meditation Spray comes in a 2 ounce Cobalt Blue Glass Bottle, which is charged with Reiki energy, before being shipped to you. Ingredients: Distilled water, Cedarwood, Clary Sage, Palo Santo, Vegetable Glycerine. Bottle Size: 2 ounces NOTE: Our Aromatherapy Sprays are made out of 100% Therapeutic Essential Oils and have been tested by family and friends but they have not been lab tested, nor are they approved by the FDA. If you have sensitive skin, please test a small patch of skin before use. This product is not for internal use, is not meant for children, and any Essential Oil product should be avoided entirely, if you are pregnant.
